meanings.definition: A type of sausage made from beef or chicken intestines.
meanings.sent1: The kishka was delicious at the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: I bought some kishka from the butcher for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The kishka rolled off the plate and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: The kishka was like a flavorful tube of meat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kishka filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The casing or skin of a sausage.
meanings.sent1: She peeled the kishka carefully before cooking.
meanings.sent2: The kishka casing held the delicious filling inside.
meanings.sent3: The kishka casing was so tough, it could be used as a drum!
meanings.sent4: The kishka casing protected the savory contents within.
meanings.sent5: The kishka casing had a shiny appearance.

meanings.definition: The filling or stuffing inside a sausage.
meanings.sent1: The kishka filling was seasoned to perfection.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the spices in the kishka filling.
meanings.sent3: The kishka filling looked like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The kishka filling burst with flavor in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The kishka filling melted in my mouth.
